form.author: Miguel Santana
form.description: Render an item placing fields in designated positions. Item Type includes additional options for other non-field elements.

field.name: item_layout_order
field.label: Item Sections
field.description: Select and order the groups and separators to be rendered

field.name: item_date_format
field.label: Date Format
field.description: Enter the format for dates. Uses JDate::format specification, based on PHP date function http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php

field.name: item_writtenby_label
field.label: Written by Label
field.description: Label to use before author name

field.name: items_addthis
field.label: Sharing Buttons
field.description: Show or hide AddThis sharing buttons on individual items.

field.name: items_addthis_after
field.label: Sharing Buttons After
field.description: Select the position of AddThis sharing buttons after a field

field.name: items_addthis_services
field.label: AddThis Services
field.description: Add the necessary AddThis services (raw HTML)

field.name: items_disqus
field.label: Comments Count
field.description: Show or hide Disqus comments count on individual items.

field.name: items_disqus_after
field.label: Comments Count After
field.description: Select the position of Disqus comments count after a field

field.name: item_css_wrapper
field.label: CSS class
field.description: Add CSS class for the item DIV wrapper

field.name: item_css_section_sep
field.description: Adds CSS classes to the category layout sections

field.name: item_css_group_sep
field.description: Adds CSS classes to the field groups

field.name: item_css_field_sep
field.description: Adds CSS classes to the individual fields

field.name: item_css_fields
field.label: Fields CSS array
field.description: An array in json format that uses field names as keys and the CSS strings as value. For example: {'image': 'right blk4', 'text': 'cf containter'}
